00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 using Niry.Network;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.Utils;
00031 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00032 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00033 
00034 namespace NyFolder.GUI.Glue {
00036     public static class Dialogs {
00037         // ============================================
00038         // PUBLIC Methods
00039         // ============================================
00041         public static void ProxySettings() {
00042             GUI.Dialogs.ProxySettings dialog = new GUI.Dialogs.ProxySettings();
00043 
00044             // Setup Proxy
00045             dialog.UseProxyAuth = Proxy.UseProxyAuth;
00046             dialog.EnableProxy = Proxy.EnableProxy;
00047             dialog.Username = Proxy.Username;
00048             dialog.Password = Proxy.Password;
00049             dialog.Host = Proxy.Host;
00050             dialog.Port = Proxy.Port;
00051 
00052             // Run Dialogs
00053             if (dialog.Run() == ResponseType.Apply) {
00054                 try {
00055                     Proxy.UseProxyAuth = dialog.UseProxyAuth;
00056                     Proxy.EnableProxy = dialog.EnableProxy;
00057                     Proxy.Username = dialog.Username;
00058                     Proxy.Password = dialog.Password;
00059                     Proxy.Host = dialog.Host;
00060                     Proxy.Port = dialog.Port;
00061 
00062                     // Save Proxy
00063                     Proxy.Save();
00064                 } catch (Exception e) {
00065                     GUI.Base.Dialogs.MessageError("Proxy Settings", e.Message);
00066                 }
00067             }
00068             dialog.Destroy();
00069         }
00070 
00072         public static void SetP2PPort() {
00073             GUI.Dialogs.SetPort dialog = new GUI.Dialogs.SetPort();
00074 
00075             if (dialog.Run() == ResponseType.Ok) {
00076                 P2PManager.Port = dialog.Port;
00077             }
00078             dialog.Destroy();
00079         }
00080 
00082         public static UserInfo AddPeer() {
00083             GUI.Dialogs.AddPeer dialog = new GUI.Dialogs.AddPeer();
00084             ResponseType response;
00085             string username;
00086             do {
00087                 response = dialog.Run();
00088                 username = dialog.Username;
00089             } while (response == ResponseType.Ok && username == null);
00090             
00091             bool secureAuth = dialog.SecureAuthentication;
00092             string ip = dialog.Ip;
00093             int port = dialog.Port;
00094             dialog.Destroy();
00095 
00096             if (response == ResponseType.Ok && username != null) {
00097                 UserInfo userInfo = new UserInfo(username, secureAuth);
00098                 userInfo.SetIpAndPort(ip, port);
00099 
00100                 try {
00101                     // Get User Ip & Port from Server
00102                     if (userInfo.SecureAuthentication == true) {
00103                         userInfo.GetIpAndPort();
00104                     }
00105                     return(userInfo);
00106                 } catch (Exception e) {
00107                     string title = "Fetch <b>" + userInfo.Name + "</b> Information";
00108                     GUI.Base.Dialogs.MessageError(title, e.Message);
00109                     return(null);
00110                 }
00111             }
00112             return(null);
00113         }
00114 
00116         public static UserInfo RemovePeer (NetworkViewer networkViewer) {
00117             GUI.Dialogs.RemovePeer dialog = new GUI.Dialogs.RemovePeer();
00118             ResponseType response = dialog.Run();
00119             string peerName = dialog.GetPeerSelected();
00120             dialog.Destroy();
00121 
00122             if (response == ResponseType.Ok && peerName != null) {
00123                 return(networkViewer.GetUserInfo(peerName));
00124             }
00125             return(null);
00126         }
00127 
00128         // ============================================
00129         // PRIVATE Methods
00130         // ============================================
00131     }
00132 }
